snippet: George T. McDonald, who developed the Doe Fund, said his campaign would focus on joblessness.
abstract: Republican George T McDonald, advocate for the homeless who developed the nonprofit Doe Fund, which helps find jobs for the indigent, announces that he plans to run for New York City mayor.
lead_paragraph: George T. McDonald, who developed the Doe Fund, said his campaign would focus on joblessness.

headline.seo: George McDonald, Founder of Doe Fund, Announces a Mayoral Run
headline.main: Advocate for the Homeless Announces a Mayoral Run
headline.print_headline: Advocate for the Homeless Announces a Mayoral Run
